briefTitle: Effect of Diacerein vs Celecoxib on Symptoms and Structural Changes in Symptomatic Knee Osteoarthritis

interventions.name: Diacerein
otherNames: Artrodar, Artrodarin, Artrolyt, Fisiodar, Galaxdar, Glizolan, Verboril

outcomeMeasures.title: Change Form Baseline in WOMAC A Pain Subscale
outcomeMeasures.description:
Change form baseline in Western Ontario and McMaster Universities Arthritis Index (WOMAC) A pain subscale after 182 days of treatment.

WOMAC A pain subscale: 0 - 50 cm; 50 = worse

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in WOMAC OA Scores
outcomeMeasures.description:
Absolute Changes from Baseline in Western Ontario and McMaster Universities Arthritis Index (WOMAC) after 182 days of treatment.

WOMAC scale: 0 - 240 cm; 240 = worse - Intention-To-Treat (N=370) Pain subscale: 0-50cm; 50 = worse; Stifness subscale: 0-20cm; 20 = worse; Function subscale: 0-170cm; 170 = worse Absolute changes in WOMAC scores: \<0 = improvement; 0 = stable; \>0 = worsening

outcomeMeasures.title: Absolute Changes From Baseline in Pain Visual Analogue Scale
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute Changes from Baseline in Pain Visual Analogue Scale (VAS): 0-10 cm; 10 = worse

outcomeMeasures.title: Assessment of Joint Swelling, Effusion or Both
outcomeMeasures.description: Assessment of Joint Swelling, joint Effusion or Both

outcomeMeasures.title: Consumption of Acetaminophen
outcomeMeasures.description: Overall Daily number of tablets taken during the 6 month study

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Patient's Global Assessment of Disease Activity
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline in global assessment of disease activity was assessed using a VAS scale (0-10cm; 10=worse)

outcomeMeasures.title: Global Assessment of Response to Therapy
outcomeMeasures.description: Between group comparison in Patient's and Investigator's Global Assessment of Response to Therapy using a 0-10 cm disease activity VAS scale: 0 cm = very well; 10 cm = very poorly

outcomeMeasures.title: Quality of Life SF-36
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute Changes from Baseline in Physical Component Summary (PCS) and Mental Component Summary (MCS) scores from the Quality of Life questionnaire SF-36. Scale range for each component (PCS and MCS): minimum = 0, maximum = 100, with higher scores indicating better quality of life. Absolute changes in each component (PCS and MCS): \>0 = improvement; 0 = stable; \<0 = worsening.

outcomeMeasures.title: Cartilage Volume Loss From Baseline in the Medial Compartment Using MRI
outcomeMeasures.description: Relative cartilage volume loss from baseline in the medial compartment of the knee using MRI

outcomeMeasures.title: Cartilage Volume Loss From Baseline in the Lateral Compartment Using MRI
outcomeMeasures.description: Relative cartilage volume loss from baseline in the lateral compartment of the knne using MRI

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Synovitis (Synovial Membrane Thickness) Using MRI
outcomeMeasures.description: Absolute Change from baseline in synovitis (synovial membrane thickness) in the global knee using MRI

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in WOMAC A Pain Subscale
outcomeMeasures.description: Relative mean change from baseline in WOMAC Pain subscore

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Global Stiffness Using WOMAC Subscale
outcomeMeasures.description: Relative Change from baseline in global stiffness using WOMAC subscale

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Visual Analogue Scale Pain (VAS-Huskisson's)
outcomeMeasures.description: Relative change from baseline in Visual Analogue Scale pain (VAS-Huskisson's)
